main.name: Shashank Kotturi
main.description: Currently a 4th year Computer Engineering student from the University of Waterloo looking for Fall 2020 internships
main.bio: Previously, I worked as a Frontend Developer in React, Redux and Express. Currently, I'm a Product Manager that works to improve customer experiences using tools like JIRA, Google Analytics and Zendesk to develop product roadmaps, gather analytics for product development and provide customer support. My hobbies include biking, travelling, cooking and politics.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
